title: fABULOUS two bedroom in Croton on Hudson./ $2500
posting_body: ['Gorgeous apt.', 'totally redone with magnificent floors and gorgeous backyard with white fence all around.', 'Flowers galore make for a magic garden.', 'Shared with upstairs tenant.', 'Right across from the great Hudson.', 'Two minutes onto 9 and 9A.', 'Pets considered.', 'Must have decent credit.', 'Only one dog allowed.', ' Street parking on Riverside Ave. and heat extra.', 'Must see  .....', 'A happy property.', 'Feels like your on vacation.', 'CallJoan to View.', '914 924 5304', 'Fee a half a months rent.', 'ERA Insite Realty', '600 North Broadway', 'White Plains.', 'NY', '10603', 'Licensed NYS sales person.//// Call Joan for appt.', '924 5304']
